alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:33AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln, southwestern Logan and southeastern McPherson Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 533 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stapleton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton and Gandy. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 219 and 242. Highway 83 between mile markers 97 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Nebraska.
